Package harrypotter

Interface HPEntityInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeathEater, Dementor, Dumbledore, HPActor, HPEntity, HPLegend, Player, Potion, Sword, TestActor, Wand
    public interface HPEntityInterface
extends EntityInterface
    All Entities and Actors in the harrypotter client package should implement this interface. It allows them to be managed by the EntityManager.
    Author:
    ram
    See Also:
    EntityInterface, EntityManager

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.EntityInterface

        addAffordance, getAffordances, getLongDescription, getShortDescription, removeAffordance, say, setLongDescription, setShortDescription, tick

    • Method Detail

      • getSymbol

        java.lang.String getSymbol()
        Returns a string symbol that represents this HPEntity or HPActor.

        The Views use this method to obtain the symbols that are used to query for resources(images) and for display.

        Returns:
        a String representing the HPEntity or HPActor.
        See Also:
        HPGridTextInterface

      • setSymbol

        void setSymbol​(java.lang.String string)
        Sets the symbol of this HPEntity or HPActor with a new string string.

        Although not a must the new symbol is preferably,

        • single character
        • unique for each HPEntity or HPActor

        The Views use this method to obtain the symbols that are used to query for resources(images) and for display.

        Parameters:
        string - a string to represent this HPEntity or HPActor

      • hasCapability

        boolean hasCapability​(Capability c)
        Returns true if this HPEntity or HPActor has the given capability c, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        c - the Capability to search for
        Returns:
        true if this Capability c is manifested, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Capability

      • getHitpoints

        int getHitpoints()
        Returns the hitpoints of this HPEntity or HPActor.
        Returns:
        the amount of hitpoints

      • takeDamage

        void takeDamage​(int damage)
        Method that reduces the hitpoints to insist damage on of this HPEntity or HPActor.
        Parameters:
        damage - the amount of hitpoints to be reduced
